title.rendered: Bihar vs Manipur, Indian First-Class Trophy 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Bihar: Sachin Kumar, Babul Kumar, Bipin Saurabh (wk), Ashutosh Aman (c), Shivam Singh, Sakibul Gani, Shivam Kumar, Veer Pratap Singh, Basukinath, Banshidar Kumar, Nawaz

Manipur: Langlonyamba Keishangbam (c), Bishworjit Konthoujam, Kangabam Priyojit Singh, Basir Rahman, Ronald Longjam , L Kishan Singha, Prafullomani Singh (wk), Ahmed Shah, Rex Rajkumar, Bikash Singh, Pheiroijam Jotin

Pitch Report

Only one Test has been played at Moin-ul-Haq Stadium in Patna. Spinners dominated the batters through and through.

Fantasy Tips of the Day

With 459 runs at 59, Babul Kumar is the highest run-scorer for Bihar. He has appeared in the Ultimate Team in 4 of 5 games.

For Manipur, Langlonyamba Keishangbam has scored the bulk of the runs. His 91 is the top score for the team this season.

However, Manipur’s star players this season have been L Kishan Singha and Pheiroijam Jotin: they have taken 33 wickets each. Jotin also has significantly contributed with the bat, scoring 179 runs at 26.

Ashutosh Aman has been consistently amongst wickets. His 24 wickets have come at a stunning average of 18.

1 / 5 ( 2 votes )
